title: The Witcher 3
descrip: This quiz tests you on your knowledge of The Witcher 3

qnsList.qns: Where is the witchers' base in the game?
Who is Geralt's lover in game?
What is the main purpose of the game?
choices: Find and save Ciri from the Wild Hunt
Rebuild your relationship with Yennefer and Triss
qnsList.ans: Find and save Ciri from the Wild Hunt

qnsList.qns: What platforms is the Witcher 3 released on?
